thread.section_title: Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful Home Away From Home
thread.title_full: Beautiful Home Away From Home - Review of Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Truh L
title: Beautiful Home Away From Home
text: It was a beautiful stay! Room is clean and bright, tastefully furnished. Hotel staff are all friendly and helpful. Free flow of coffee is a warm gesture. Greatly enjoyed the stay! Will come back here again! Can definitely feel the passion and pride the team has in upkeeping the high standard. Keep it up!
